ai-thig5.5:1.1_0: In the past I worshiped the sacred flame,
ai-thig5.5:1.2_0: the moon, the sun, and the gods.
ai-thig5.5:1.3_0: Having gone to a river ford,
ai-thig5.5:2.3_0: I would lie down on a sunshade.
ai-thig5.5:2.4_0: I ate no food at night.
ai-thig5.5:3.1_0: I was jewellery, whose banner shines.
ai-thig5.5:3.4_0: I was racked by desire for pleasures of the senses.
ai-thig5.5:4.4_0: desire for sensual pleasure is eradicated.
